buildCommand: node -e "f=require('fs');c=f.readFileSync('src/app/api/watches/route.ts','utf8');l=c.split('\n');n=l.map((x,i)=>({x,i})).filter(({x})=>x.trim()==='const now = new Date()');if(n.length>1){n.slice(1).reverse().forEach(({i})=>l.splice(i,1));f.writeFileSync('src/app/api/watches/route.ts',l.join('\n'));}" && npm run build
